price: 57. Sinaamey nummah ama Qhuraanay elle kaskassowtaanay Yallih digaala sin kassiisa sin Rabbik siinih yemeete, usuk iggimaa kee agaywaagâ dalkay lubbittet tanik diwa kinni, makot gexxaanamak tirtooy moominiiniy kaa kataatteh nacrooro.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكُم مَّوۡعِظَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَشِفَآءٞ لِّمَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ وَهُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu qad jāatkum mawʿiẓatun min rabbikum washifāon limā fī al-ṣudūri wahudan waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna
